attributes.action: I want 'the Webb Report' debated in Parliament.
attributes.additional_details: The people and Parliament need to see 'the Webb Report' and supporting documents. All will be perfectly clear. Mine is a transparent case of abuse, bias, lies and corruption and the longer my case is ignored, the more people will fall foul of this public body that is entrusted by law to protect us.
attributes.background: 'The Webb Report' and supporting documents will prove to Parliament that yet another public body is guilty of abusing their power, the public and the law.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
